L'ancien milieu de terrain allemand du Bayern Munich et de Manchester United s'est exprim√© au sujet du d√©part de l'ancien entra√Æneur bavarois, Niko Kovac.
04 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Niko Kovac Niko Kovac n'est plus l'entra√Æneur du Bayern Munich. Il a √©t√© remerci√© ce soir par ses dirigeants. D√©couvrez sans plus attendre le nom de ses possibles successeurs.Icon Sport



Ars√®ne WengerFavori dans la course, l'Alsacien a r√©cemment confi√© qu'il √©tait pr√™t √† reprendre du service, quelques mois apr√®s la fin de son aventure avec Arsenal.Icon Sport



Zinedine ZidaneAnnonc√© √† Manchester United un temps puis √† la Juventus, le Fran√ßais n'a toujours pas donn√© signe d'une quelconque volont√© de revenir au football pour le moment. Mais un gros d'Europe comme le Bayern pourrait le sortir de son ann√©e sabbatique.



Julian NagelsmannPetit prodige du football allemand, l'actuel entra√Æneur d'Hoffenheim serait la cible √† long terme du Bayern. En urgence, le club pourrait choisir de l'arracher √† son club.



Antonio ConteDepuis son d√©part de Chelsea, l'Italien a d√©j√† √©t√© envoy√© au Real Madrid, o√π Julen Lopetegui est lui aussi dans la tourmente.

Jupp HeynckesLe sauveur du club bavarois reviendra t-il encore pour remettre le navire √† flot ? Apr√®s avoir pris sa retraite une premi√®re fois, Heynckes √©tait revenu la saison derni√®re mais avait refus√© de prolonger malgr√© l'envie des dirigeants. Il reste n√©anmoins toujours une solution.

text:
Bundesliga
Bayern Munich: Schweinsteiger "imagine" Mourinho in Germany!
Former German midfielder Bayern Munich and Manchester United commented on the departure of former Bavarian coach Niko Kovac.
04 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Niko Kovac Niko Kovac is no longer the coach of Bayern Munich. He was thanked tonight by his leaders. Discover without further delay the names of his possible successors.Icon Sport



Ars√®ne WengerFavori in the race, the Alsatian recently confided that he was ready to return to service, a few months after the end of his adventure with Arsenal.Icon Sport



Zinedine Zidane Announced at Manchester United once and then at Juventus, the Frenchman has still not shown any sign of wanting to return to football at the moment. But a big European like Bayern could take him out of his sabbatical year.



Julian NagelsmannSmall German football prodigy, the current coach of Hoffenheim would be the long-term target of Bayern. In emergency, the club could choose to snatch it from his club.



Antonio ConteSince his departure from Chelsea, the Italian has already been sent to Real Madrid, where Julen Lopetegui is also in turmoil.



Laurent BlancThere is no club where the former PSG coach has not been announced. Chelsea, Real Madrid, Inter, AC Milan. Why not Bayern?



Jupp HeynckesThe savior of the Bavarian club will he come back again to put the ship back? After retiring for the first time, Heynckes returned last season but refused to extend despite the desire of the leaders. Nevertheless, there is always a solution.

Bayern Munich: These possible successors of Kovac




What if Jose Mourinho became the coach of Bayern Munich? The coaching post, left vacant by Niko Kovac after his departure following the setback that Bayern followed this weekend against Frankfurt (5-1), rumors are going well. The names of Arsene Wenger, Laurent Blanc, Allegri or Rangnick are often mentioned. Nevertheless, the runway Jose Mourinho is also possible. In an interview with the German newspaper Bild, Bastian Schweinsteiger, would welcome the arrival of the Portuguese coach in Bavaria.




"I can imagine Mourinho in Germany"




Jos√© Mourinho + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The two men played side by side in the 2016-2017 season, when Bastian Schweinsteiger was still playing under the direction of Portuguese: "I can imagine Mourinho in Germany, I remember that he always asked me questions about Bayern and the Bundesliga In our away games, there was always the Bundesliga on television, he really knew all the players, even the least known, he also learned German, he did not work in the Bundesliga so I guess he'd be tempted by an experience there. "
